name: Dual EM Stars
description: These firearms are designed based on railguns, and must be used in a pair.

normals.name: Dual Fire
normals.description:
Tap normal attack while on the ground to launch up to **5** consecutive attacks with the dual pistols.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to **56.5%** of ATK plus **340**.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to **43%** of ATK plus **258**.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to **143.6%** of ATK plus **862**.
Fourth attack: Deal total damage equal to **135.7%** of ATK plus **815**.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to **184.8%** of ATK plus **1109** and **launch** the target.

normals.name: Bullet Rain
normals.description: While airborne, use normal attack to fire continuously at the ground, dealing damage equal to **54.3%** of ATK plus **365** damage, each hit consumes **150** endurance.

normals.name: Energy Burst
normals.description: Hold attack button to maintain constant fire, each hit dealing **27.6%** of ATK plus **166** base damage.

normals.name: Phantom Kick
normals.description: While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Phantom Kick. Knock the target down and deal damage equal to **84.6%** of ATK plus **508**. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **118.4%** of ATK plus **710** to nearby targets and **strongly launch** them.

dodge.name: Rising Lightning Kick
dodge.description: Tap normal attack after dodging to **strongly suspend** targets and deal damage equal to **147.1%** of ATK plus **883**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Electro Field
skill.description: Fire an energy shield at the target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to **323.8%** of ATK plus **1943**, and the last hit **strongly suspends** targets. Cooldown: **45**-seconds.

discharge.name: Domain of Thunder
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and create a Domain of Thunder at the target location, **strongly suspending** targets within range and dealing a total of **286%** of ATK plus **1716** damage over **3** attacks to them while dispelling their buffs. The domain lasts for **3.5** seconds and deals damage equal to **50.9%** of ATK plus **305** to a target every **0.5** seconds.

advancements.description: Trigger an electrical explosion on the target after landing a critical hit, dealing additional damage equal to **30%** of ATK to the target and nearby enemies. Cooldown: **0.2** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Increase crit rate to electrified targets by **40%**. Electrical explosions extend the duration of electrified effects by **0.5** seconds, up to a maximum of **5** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Double the duration of Electro Field and pull targets into the center of the attack.
Triggering an electrical explosion reduces skill cooldowns by **1** second.
